exceptions.tactic: intros sigma Hlocks_correct Hmutual_exclusion h1 h2 Hheld_m1 Hheld_m2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall sigma : name -> data, locks_correct sigma -> mutual_exclusion sigma

Premises:
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
locks_correct = fun sigma : name -> data => forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments locks_correct _%function_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mutual_exclusion = fun sigma : name -> data => forall m n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client m)) = true -> held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> m = n : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments mutual_exclusion _%function_scope
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
state_invariant_maintained_deliver : forall (p : packet) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1; state_invariant_init : state_invariant init_handlers; state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_old : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' q : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> network_invariant sigma q -> network_network_invariant p q -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_network_invariant p' q where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = pDst p -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma (pDst p) st') p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
Build_Decomposition : forall (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) (state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop) (network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop) (network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop), (forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1) -> state_invariant init_handlers -> (forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> state_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')) ->...-> Decomposition B M
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_old : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p p' : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> In (pDst p', pBody p') ps -> pSrc p' = h -> network_network_invariant p p' where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> In (pDst p, pBody p) ps -> pSrc p = h -> network_invariant (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') p where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_deliver_new : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)) (p : packet), net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (sigma (pDst p)) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> network_invariant sigma p -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
network_network_invariant_maintained_input_new : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := h; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?Decomposition : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
step_failure_star_lb_step_execution : forall s : infseq (event (list name * network) label (name * (input + list output))), event_step_star step_failure step_failure_init (hd s) -> lb_step_execution lb_step_failure s -> always (now (event_step_star step_failure step_failure_init)) s where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?labeled_multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- LabeledMultiParams ?P] ?failure_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams unlabeled_multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_1_sind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P d d0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- OneNodeParams ?P]
step_1_ind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input * output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input * output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P d d0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- OneNodeParams ?P]
step_s_sind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P d d0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- SingleParams ?P]
step_s_ind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P d d0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- SingleParams ?P]
step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
step_failure_sind : forall P : list name * network -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
net_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, net_handlers, _) as MultiParams return (name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) := MultiParams0 in net_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams : MultiParams P), name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) Arguments net_handlers {P MultiParams}
nw_nw_distinct_pairs_and_elim : forall (xs : list packet) (a b : packet) (ys l : list packet), l = xs ++ a :: ys -> In b (xs ++ ys) -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant l -> network_network_invariant a b where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?d : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
onwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (o : ordered_network) => let (onwPackets, _) := o in onwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), ordered_network -> name -> name -> list msg Arguments onwPackets {P params}
odnwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (o : ordered_dynamic_network) => let (_, odnwPackets, _) := o in odnwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P), ordered_dynamic_network -> name -> name -> list msg Arguments odnwPackets {P multi_params}
Build_MultiParams : forall (P : BaseParams) (name msg : Type), (forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall nodes : list name, (forall n : name, In n nodes) -> NoDup nodes -> (name -> data) -> (name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> (name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg)) -> MultiParams P
StepFailure_reboot : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name), In h failed -> failed' = remove name_eq_dec h failed -> net' = {| nwPackets := nwPackets net; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (reboot (nwState net h)) |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') [] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_fail : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_fail (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net)))); odnwState := odnwState net |} -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (h :: failed, net') [] where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepFailureDiskOp_reboot : forall (h : do_name) (net net' : do_network) (failed failed' : list do_name) (d : data) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)), In h failed -> failed' = remove do_name_eq_dec h failed -> do_reboot h (disk_to_channel (nwdoDisk net h)) = (d, ops) -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := nwdoPackets net; nwdoState := update do_name_eq_dec (nwdoState net) h d; nwdoDisk := update do_name_eq_dec (nwdoDisk net) h (apply_ops (nwdoDisk net h) ops) |} -> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed', net') [] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [num_Clients : nat |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
lb_step_failure_ind : forall P : list name * network -> label -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) lb (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p l p0 l0
lb_step_failure_sind : forall P : list name * network -> label -> list name * network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (lb_name * lb_msg)) (lb : label), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> lb_net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (lb, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P (failed, net) lb (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P p l p0 l0
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} ->...-> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]

```   
intros sigma Hlocks_correct Hmutual_exclusion h1 h2 Hheld_m1 Hheld_m2.
apply (Hmutual_exclusion h1 h2).
- apply (Hlocks_correct h1).
  apply Hheld_m1.
- apply (Hlocks_correct h2).
  apply Hheld_m2.
```

original: intros sigma Hlocks_correct Hmutual_exclusion h1 h2 Hheld_m1 Hheld_m2. apply (Hmutual_exclusion h1 h2). - apply (Hlocks_correct h1). apply Hheld_m1. - apply (Hlocks_correct h2). apply Hheld_m2.
